answers.answer: Its ok with my first i wad 136 lbs when i went to give birth i was 204lbs now with my second im only 10weeks n 4days but dont know how much ive gained yet..
Have u been eating healthy and workin out?? If nkt u sgud start now evn if its jus walking to prevent excessive weight gain
Also were you underweight to start with?

I'm a ftm 24 wks and I've gained 27lbs lol I was 106 lbs before I got pregnant and i gained 9 lbs my 5th month but i eat healthy and my job requires me to constantly walk so I get plenty of exercise! As long as you eat healthy and exercise you'll be fine!!
this is my 5th child and I'm 26w5d I've gained 32lbs this pregnancy.  this past month I didn't gain anything and my dr hasn't said anything about it.
I gained 80lbs. with my first, 50lbs. with my 2nd. I'm 29 weeks with my 3rd and have gained 35lbs. so far. I was @ 40lbs. but due to a lot of stress I lost 5lbs. In the last 2 weeks.

Dr only wants a max weight gain of 35lbs. And if u start pregnancy overweight then recommend to gain even less then 35 lbs. The more weight makes labor harder for you. I'd switch to a low carb or even no carb diet. They say you gain the most weight in the last trimester. With my first I gained a lot the last trimester but with my 2nd I didn't gain anything in the last trimester. So who knows lol

I have gained 22 pounds and am  23 weeks. I'm freaking out too.  Plus I'm frustrated with clothes to work out in. All the maternity clothes are so expensive to work out in. Even target maternity yoga pants were 35. I bought what I could but still I only have 2 shirts and 2 pants and 2 sports bras. . Sorry about the rant but I completely understand

I started at 108 lbs last drs apt I was up to 130 at my 24 week checkup I asked the nurse if it was normal/ok she said yes it should slow down soon enough im also a ftm and freaked out as well but I dont eat terrible and im constantly walking soooo unless the dr has an issue with it im going to just not worry about it and remain positive everyones body is different....
I gained 60 with my first due to preeclampsia and only 15 with my second.

question: So I'm 21 weeks and I've already gained 21 pounds total since I've found out. Has anyone else had the scale jump up on them? It's my firstbaby and I'm kinda freaking out.
title: Weight Gain
